column1: 486 ops were eligible to use tensor cores but none are using FP16
column2: Try enabling AMP (Automatic Mixed Precision). For more information: https://developer.nvidia.com/automatic-mixed-precision

column1: The following GPU device IDs are not being used: 1 2
column2: Make sure to pass the necessary options to docker, the framework, and the model to use all available GPUs

column1: 11.3% of the aggregated run was spent in the dataloader while not simultaneously running on the GPU
column2:
Focus on reducing time spent in the training data input process. This could be time spent in file reading, preprocessing and augmentation or file transfer.
Consider using NVIDIA DALI, a library that is a high performance alternative to built-in data loaders and data iterators. Learn more here: https://developer.nvidia.com/DALI

column1: Unable to split profile into training iterations: key op  not found
column2: Specify key op by setting the --key_op argument
